description: Grants all permissions and bypasses all channel restrictions.
Allows managing server settings (name, region, integrations, etc.).
Allows creating, editing, and deleting roles lower than your own.
Allows creating, editing, and deleting channels.
Allows managing webhooks.
Allows managing emojis, stickers, and soundboard sounds.
Allows viewing the server's audit logs.
Allows viewing server analytics and insights.
Allows kicking members from the server.
Allows banning members from the server.
Allows timing out members.
Allows changing other users' nicknames.
Allows deleting or pinning messages from others.
Allows managing threads (rename, archive, delete).
Allows uploading emojis, stickers, and soundboard sounds.
Allows using @everyone, @here, and all role mentions.
Allows muting members in voice channels.
Allows deafening members in voice channels.
Allows moving members between voice channels.
Lowers the volume of others when you speak.
Allows editing and deleting scheduled events.
Allows creating scheduled events.
Allows using slash commands from bots and apps.
Allows using soundboard sounds from other servers.
Allows using the soundboard in voice channels.
Allows embedding links in messages.
Allows uploading files.
Allows adding emoji reactions to messages.
Allows using emojis from other servers.
Allows using stickers from other servers.
Allows sending messages in text channels.
Allows sending messages in threads.
Allows creating public threads.
Allows creating private threads.
Allows changing your own nickname.
Allows viewing channels.
Allows joining voice channels.
Allows speaking in voice channels.
Allows sharing video or screen.
Allows using voice activity detection.
Allows creating invite links.
